data.title: Anil Kapoor’s iconic film ‘Humara Dil Aapke Paas Hai’ completes 24 years
data.meta_description: Anil Kapoor, a versatile actor who has excelled in various genres, was particularly renowned for his family dramas during a certain period. One such iconic film, "Humara Dil Aapke Paas Hai," recently celebrated its 24th anniversary.
data.text:
Anil Kapoor, a versatile actor who has excelled in various genres, was particularly renowned for his family dramas during a certain period. One such iconic film, "Humara Dil Aapke Paas Hai," recently celebrated its 24th anniversary.

The film reunited him with Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, following their successful on-screen partnership in "Taal."

Not only did their hit pairing draw audiences to theatres, but also the compelling roles they portrayed. Kapoor's exceptional acting skills and his natural chemistry with Aishwarya were widely appreciated by the audience.

Anil Kapoor's dedication to his craft was admired by his co-star and child artist, Isha Talwar. In a previous interview, Talwar recounted a memorable moment from the set of "Humara Dil Aapke Paas Hai."

Also Read: Ranbir Kapoor, Vicky Kaushal and Alia Bhatt to begin shooting for Sanjay Leela Bhansali's Love And War: Report

She shared that Kapoor insisted on filming a particularly intense scene, involving a scream, 45 times, demonstrating his unwavering commitment to perfection.

The film, starring Anil Kapoor and Aishwarya Rai, has endured the test of time and continues to captivate audiences today.

Anil Kapoor is currently preparing for his upcoming project, "Subedaar," which marks his first collaboration with director Suresh Triveni. Additionally, rumours are circulating about his potential involvement in the YRF Spy Universe as a RAW agent.
